K12D0677=D0864_H0491:28b-1: bha ga b'an aa mi t'a bha dh'a ra n'i mantra /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-1: snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha'
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-8: aa mi ta sam bha be /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-9: aa mi ta bi kr'anta k'a re /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-10: aa mi ta ga ga na k'irti ka re sarba kle sha ksha yam ka ri sv'ah'a /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-11: gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-12: bsags pa'i las gyi sgrib pa yang 'di lan gsum
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-13: bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad bar
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-14: 'gyur ro // lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-15: rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang yongs su byang bar gyur
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-16: 'gyur ro // te / sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro //
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-17: bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran par bya'o //
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-20: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-21: ma h'i du hi ke sv'ah'a /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-22: lus la nad byung ba dang /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-23: nad khong skams su gyur kyang rung ste /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-24: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-25: bsil yab kyis de la g-yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro //
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-26: gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs te /
K12D0677=D0864_H0491:29a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par bstod do ////
